zap.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: to quickly attack or destroy something, especially using a beam of electricity
zap.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: Doctors have tried zapping tumors with high-voltage radiation.
The laser weapons are designed to zap enemy missiles.
zap.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: to change channels on a television by using a remote control
zap.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: Dave just sat there, zapping through all the channels.
zap.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: to cook something in a microwave1(1)
zap.translation[0].definitions[3].defini: to send information quickly from one computer to another
zap.translation[0].definitions[3].exampl: Computers identify threats and zap the results back to US pilots in the war zone.
